name: Lickitung

evolution.description: Lickitung can evolve into Lickilicky at the time it learns 'Rollout'. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 12 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Licking Pokémon. Its tongue spans almost seven feet and moves more freely than its forelegs. Its licks can cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming confused.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather-related abilities have no effect on the Pokémon that have them.
